select * from ( Select aa.orgid, consultid, conmethod, conpeople, condate, cc.codename as nexus, patiname, bb.codename as mediachannel, sex, birthday, caretype, worktype, address, intention, bedid, planindate, conphone, aa.memo, status, aa.createdate, aa.createuser, aa.updatedate, updateuser, serialnum, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by aa.createdate ) rowNumber From ConsultInfo aa left join dictcode bb on bb.codetypeid='10003' and aa.MediaChannel = bb.codeid and aa.OrgId=bb.OrgId left join dictcode cc on cc.codetypeid='10001' and aa.nexus = cc.codeid and cc.OrgId=aa.OrgId where 1=1 $Condition$ ) aa where rowNumber BETWEEN #Next# and #Prev#
